Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Role Summary/ Purpose
              
              The Material Planner will provide direction and assistance to work group in order to meet assigned objectives.
              

              Essential Responsibilities
              
              •	In this role, you will work within defined parameters to make decisions, apply concepts to issues of moderate complexity, and resolve issues through immediate action or short-term planning.
              
              •	Work closely with Sourcing, Manufacturing and Warehouse for Raw Material and manufacturing planning activities of GE Energy Haiphong Plant· Monitoring and running MRP process for raw material requirement planning
              
              •	Work with related team to make manufacturing planning
              
              •	Upon Raw material supply planning. Making Purchase requisition for direct material supplied for manufacturing
              
              •	Coordination with Sourcing, Manufacturing and Warehouse to ensure the smooth operation of planning, incoming Raw material to maximize the inventory utilization and manufacturing capacity
              
              •	In coordination with Warehouse, manufacturing, Sourcing department in inventory control
              
              •	Comply with the policy of company and GE global: Responsible for developing competencies of the team GE global: Responsible for developing competencies of the team.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	1~2 years of working experience, especially in purchasing or related with parts and material expertise.
              
              •	Proactive, problem solving.
              
              •	Ability to prioritize workloads and meet deadlines.
              
              •	Experience with manufacturing processes
              
              •	Good negotiation and communication skill.
              
              •	Good English both in verbal and written
              

              Desired Characteristics
              
              •	Ability to manage multiple tasks and establish effective work priorities
              
              •	Prior experience in production control or planning, supervision, sourcing or material control environment
              
              •	Ability to work effectively in all environments
              
              •	Strong oral and written communication skills
              
              •	Strong interpersonal and leadership skills
